descr.p: Utility functions used throughout fpGUI. Some have common implementations and some have platform specific implementations.

element.name: fpgToOSEncoding
element.short: Converts string from fpGUI to OS specific filesystem encoding
element.descr: This function is specific to filesystem strings like Paths, Filenames and Directories.

element.name: fpgFromOSEncoding
element.short: Converts OS specific filesystem encoding to fpGUI string
element.descr: This function is specific to filesystem strings like Paths, Filenames and Directories.

element.name: fpgOpenURL
element.short: Launches the users Web Browser using the specified URL
element.descr: On each platform, this function will try and find the appropriate (system default) web browser.

element.name: fpgFileSize
element.short: Returns the given file's size in bytes

element.name: fpgAddTrailingValue
element.short: If ALine is not '', add the trailing value AValue
element.descr: If ALine is not '', add the trailing value AValue

element.name: fpgAddTrailingValue.AValue
element.short: The value that must be added

element.name: fpgAppendPathDelim
element.short: Appends the path delimiter to the given string

element.name: fpgHasSubDirs
element.short: This function returns True if the directory passed has subdirectories

element.name: fpgConvertLineEndings
element.short: Replaces all line endings in the string with the native line ending

element.name: fpgAddColon
element.short: Appends a colon symbol to the given text
element.descr: . This is so that when we support LTR and RTL languages, the colon will be added at the correct place. Currently the RTL behaviour has not been implemented yet.

element.name: fpgIsBitSet
element.short: Read a specific bit value in a LongInt variable
element.descr: This procedure allows you to read a specific AIndex bit value from the AData variable.

element.name: fpgGetBit
element.short: Read a specific bit value in a LongInt variable
element.descr: This procedure allows you to read a specific ABit bit value from the AData variable.

element.name: fpgSetBit
element.short: Set a specific bit value in a LongInt variable
element.descr: This function allows you to set a specific ABit bit value in a the AData variable.

element.name: fpgGetToolkitConfigDir
element.short: Returns the general fpGUI Toolkit config file
element.descr: . This is used to store user defined values that apply to the whole fpGUI toolkit and applications developed with fpGUI. Things like directory bookmarks, global themes, fonts etc.

element.name: fpgAllFilesMask
element.short: Returns the all files mask used to filter files
element.descr: . This is used in the File Dialog, File Grid and many other places. Because FPC 2.2.2 and later contains the ALLFilesMask variable, this function is now deprecated.
